SEARCH
Package org.example.utility.courses

Class CourseAssembly

java.lang.Object
org.example.utility.courses.CourseAssembly
public class CourseAssembly extends Object
The CourseAssembly class is responsible for managing course data, including recommending courses based on user input, reading credentials, and running course assessments.

  • Field Details

    • courseMap

      protected static Map<String,Course> courseMap
      A static map that holds courses by their course code. The course code is the key, and the course object is the value.

    • recommendedCoursesByGrade

      public static Map<Integer,String[]> recommendedCoursesByGrade
      A static map that stores recommended courses for each grade. The grade is the key, and the value is an array of recommended course names.

    • CREDENTIALS_FILE

      public static final String CREDENTIALS_FILE
      A constant string representing the file path where user credentials are stored. This file is used to validate user login credentials.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • credits

      public static HashMap<String,Integer> credits
      A static HashMap that stores course categories and their corresponding credit values. Each entry in the map represents a specific course or course group and its associated credit value. The keys represent course categories (e.g., "Arts", "Health and Physical Education", etc.), and the values represent the number of credits awarded for completing the course or category.

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseAssembly

      public CourseAssembly()
      Constructor for the CourseAssembly class. Loads the course data from the ExcelUtility.

  • Method Details

    • addInitialCourses

      public static void addInitialCourses(UserInput student)
      Adds initial courses to the recommended courses list based on the user's track (e.g., university or college) and previously completed courses.
      Parameters:
      student - The UserInput object representing the student.

    • getCourse

      public static Course getCourse(String courseCode)
      Retrieves a course from the course map based on its course code.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - The course code to search for.
      Returns:
      The Course object, or null if not found.

    • readCredentialsFromFile

      public static String[] readCredentialsFromFile()
      Reads credentials (e.g., API key and password) from a file.
      Returns:
      An array containing the password and API key, or null values if an error occurs.

    • runAssessment

      public static void runAssessment(UserInput student)
      Runs the course recommendation and assessment process for a student.
      Parameters:
      student - The UserInput object representing the student.
